title: The History Inside Chronicles: Battle for Greece
description: Here is displayed the History of Herodotus of Halicarnassus, made so that the deeds of humankind should not be forgotten in time, and that great and wondrous deeds – some displayed by the Hellenes, some by the barbarians – should not lose their glory, including among other things the cause of their waging war on … Continued

title: Age of Empires IV – Patch 12.0.2246
description: While we’re still planning for a slightly larger patch before the end of the year, we wanted to roll out a few pointed fixes earlier based on your feedback. Today’s minor patch is focused on stability, Multiplayer Pause adjustments, and some additional early balance tuning in response to player input regarding the changes to Siege.  … Continued

title: Expanding Naval Warfare in Chronicles: Battle for Greece
description: Seamanship is an art, no different from any other art; it cannot be taken up occasionally as a leisurely pursuit – rather it is so exacting that it leaves leisure for nothing else! – Thucydides, The Peloponnesian War 1.142.9 Hoist the sails, harangue the oarsmen, and pour libations for favorable winds, as CaptureAge prepares to … Continued

title: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition – Data Patch for Build 15.59076
description: Welcome trailblazers to another exciting update for Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition! While there are plenty of notable fixes and features in today’s update, you can look forward to lots of balance updates, plus some localization fixes based on community feedback! This is a data patch that will update your game automatically after starting. … Continued

title: Age of Empires IV – Season Nine Update 12.0.1974 Live!
description: Note: Ranked Season Nine and the Hallow’s Hearth Event should now be up and running as normal! The Season Nine Update has been verified on Steam and Xbox platforms and is continuing to roll out on Microsoft Store. The major update for Season NINE, is LIVE!
